column5: SESN VKTX ARWR VSTM Hey everyone can we get a shout out to all of those Care Bears reminding us that biotech is very risky and that we should get out while we can The same ones who ironically lurk on Bio boards all day and pump ones THEY think are amazing Lots of narcissim on ST but none more than with this particular breed Usually scorned because they got out too early or too late Trust and believe in your own judgement and DD as most bios DO fail If you are not sure get out like they claim you should
